tool_description: An API Fetches all climate change news from newspapers
name: Climate Change News
title: Climate Change News

api_list.name: Get news from individual newspaper
api_list.description: It will return climate change related news from individual newspaper
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-news18.p.rapidapi.com/news/dailymail"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-news18.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-news18.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-news18.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get climate change related news
api_list.description: This endpoint returns about climate change related news from different newspaper
